EmailTemplate.subject: New Approaches, New Displays and New Upgrade Options with Duncan Aviation and CDS/R
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.duncanaviation.aero/]]>
Did you know that Honeywell’s Primus Epic® control display system/retrofit (CDS/R) upgrade provides a path for Falcon 900A/B operators to add FMS 6.1? Honeywell’s FMS 6.1 software upgrade provides pilots with WAAS-LPV, giving them access to approximately 1,888 airports across the United States.
CDS/R also gives operators the option to add Honeywell’s SmartRunway® and SmartLanding® software, which was created to:
- Increase situational awareness during taxi, take-off and landing; stabilize approaches;
- Decrease the risk of runway incursions and excursions;
- Support heads-up operations and more.
Matched with new displays and FMS 6.1 software upgrade, the CDS/R upgrade provides a new level of safety and convenience to the cockpit.
To show Honeywell’s commitment to supporting CDS/R, Falcon 900A/B operators who upgrade are eligible for one free year of HAPP after installation has been complete, and a $10,000 discount off years 2 and 3 of their 3-year or 5-year contract. As an added benefit, Honeywell is offering fixed year-over-year pricing on 5-year contracts.
